exercise.instructions: Drag each label to the correct location. Select Submit when you are finished.
exercise.correct: Congratulations, your answers are correct.Select Next to continue.
exercise.tryAgain: Your answers are incorrect. Please try again.
exercise.incorrect: Your answers are still wrong. Select Reveal to see the correct answers.
exercise.revealed: The labels are now in their correct locations.
